Reviews.Title: “Great Business Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Cindy-Milford
Reviews.Content: nice 312 star business hotel pluses extremely helpful front desk staff comfortable beds nicely decorated quiet quietest hotels stayed time moderate size huge seating bathroom bit cramped 2 sharing sufficient pool nicely maintained indoor breakfast bar included waffle maker enjoy nice breakfast bring own computer lobby guest check emails etc close texas roadhouse restaurants 8 minutes convention center negatives gym tiny 2 treadmills 1 falling apart weight machine missing elliptical glad brought barely swing

Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for. Cheap, clean, a bit run down”
Reviews.Author: KDenton
Reviews.Content: ive stayed comfort inn twice visiting friends indy fairly happy times deal quality yes elevator little managers friendly decent shape eaten breakfast hotel recent trip checked 330 maids getting ready sent clean pillow called manager apologized stating maid told soon wed gone upstairs theyd fix left pillowcases time night

HotelInfo.Name: Comfort Inn South
